price: Nkͻmhyεni, adεn na worebra woho wͻ adeε a Nyankopͻn ama wo ho kwan wͻ ho? Wode hwehwε sε wo yerenom bεgye wo atum? Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ تَبۡتَغِي مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡوَٰجِكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu lima tuḥarrimu mā aḥalla al-lahu laka tabtaghī marḍāta azwājika wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
